glossary.term: Activation Lock Bypass Code (啟用鎖定繞過代碼)
App Privacy Permissions Visibility (App 隱私權限可見度)
Apple Intelligence Reports (Apple Intelligence 報告與管理)
Audio Accessory Configuration (音訊配件設定)
Automatic App Updates（自動更新 App）
Background App Refresh（背景 App 重新整理）
Background Security Improvements (背景安全改良)
Blob URLs and Managed Open-In Improvement (Blob URL 與管理式 Open-In 改進)
Camera Access Control per App (個別 App 相機存取控制)
DDM App Management (宣告式 App 管理)
Declarative App Management (宣告式 App 管理)
Declarative Software Updates (宣告式軟體更新)
DNS over HTTPS/TLS (DNS 加密協定)
Drag and Drop Multitasking (拖放式多工)
FileVault Unlock over SSH (透過 SSH 解鎖 FileVault)
Intel Mac End-of-Support Milestone (Intel Mac 支援終止里程碑)
Managed App Framework (管理式 App 框架)
Managed Apple Account (管理式 Apple 帳號)
Network Extension URL Filtering API (網路擴充功能 URL 過濾 API)
Platform SSO in Setup Assistant (設定輔助程式中的 Platform SSO)
Private Wi-Fi Address (私有 Wi-Fi 位址)
Restrict App Downloads over Cellular (限制透過行動網路下載 App)
Setup Pane Skipping (跳過設定輔助程式面板)
Student Information System（SIS，學生資訊系統）
Transfer to Android Tool (移轉至 Android 工具)
User Approved MDM（使用者核准的 MDM）
Zero-Wipe MDM Migration (零抹除 MDM 遷移)
